Maritana [arr. Round]
Earl's Court, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Prizes: £35, £20, £12, £8 This was the Lincolnshire, Leicestershire, Bedfordshire & Northamptonshire section of a series of contests. In the event only the Yorkshire round and this round was run.
Reported in Northampton Herald, 19th June 1897
